title: BulkOperationsInventory
description: This schema is used to set inventory counts on merchant SKUs for file uploads

merchant_sku.description: The merchant SKU that should be affected by the prices in this object

fulfillment_node_id.description: The fulfillment node assigned in the Jet Merchant Portal for a merchant fulfillment node

quantity.description: The quantity of inventory for the given SKU in a given fulfillment node
